meanings.definition: A compound containing three oxygen atoms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied different trioxids in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Trioxids are commonly found in nature as well.
meanings.sent3: The trioxids in the experiment decided to throw a party in the test tube.
meanings.sent4: The trioxids danced together, creating a beautiful chemical reaction.
meanings.sent5: The trioxids glowed brightly under the microscope, revealing their unique structure.

meanings.sent1: She bought a bag of trioxids for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The shelf was filled with various trioxids.
meanings.sent3: The trioxids on the shelf seemed to be having a meeting.
meanings.sent4: The trioxids lined up neatly, like soldiers ready for duty.
meanings.sent5: The colorful trioxids caught the eye of the curious students.
